column5: The Ambassador is an upscale layout complete with granite countertops, private patios, upgraded seating, high-definition widescreen TVs and satellite receivers or cable with premium channels in every room. The Ambassador offers the highest quality accommodations You'll find indoor and outdoor swimming pools (plus a children's pool), whirlpool/hot tub, tennis, basketball, shuffleboard, volleyball, a fitness center, playground, mini golf, and much more.
